response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship that I believe could enrich your life in ways you might not even imagine. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $950,000. I understand that the true value of such an item is subjective and deeply personal, but I am confident that my offer reflects a fair assessment of its worth. Please consider this proposal carefully and let me know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions. I look forward to potentially sharing this remarkable piece with you.", "product_price": 950000}
